messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Cathrine Simmons has been actively involved in local green politics and community roles for over 20 years. Concerns about climate change and wasting money on security and high PPCs are mentioned.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet promotes fair wages by advocating for a living wage.
The candidate aims to create new jobs, particularly in the green sector.
The leaflet highlights the importance of the National Health Service and the need to protect it.

mentions.candidate: I believe the greens have the policies to create real economic, social, and environmental justice.

issues.environment: Cathrine Simmons has been involved in local green politics and is worried about climate change.
issues.health: The leaflet has a section titled 'Protect our NHS' indicating the importance of health services.

housing.content: Cathrine Simmons plans to make housing more affordable with a focus on town center to reinstate popular, fairs high street of town center supermarkets.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live in Great Torrington with my partner and family.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked on creating affordable housing and reinstating town center supermarkets.

images.caption: Cathrine Simmons visiting the potential site for solar panels and a biomass boiler and a Tarka Trail winner of a green business award.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains images relating to living wage, job creation, and the NHS, but does not provide specific policy details.
